title: The Law Closes in on Jeffrey Epstein & A Blackout Rocks Manhattan | Dapper Dan
itunes:title: The Law Closes in on Jeffrey Epstein & A Blackout Rocks Manhattan | Dapper Dan
description:
The FBI finds incriminating evidence in Jeffrey Epstein's mansion, New York City experiences a major blackout, and Dapper Dan discusses his book "Dapper Dan: Made in Harlem."

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
